Lets see what this does.

```{r}
#| warning: false
#| echo: false
setwd("/home/ni3853/Documents/quartoproj")


library(dplyr)
library(readr)
library(ggplot2)
starwars <- read_csv("./data/clean_data/starwars.csv")


```

now make a table?




```{r}
#| warning: false
#| echo: false

library(knitr)
tab <- starwars %>%
  group_by(species) %>%
  summarise(
    n = n(),
    mass = mean(mass, na.rm = TRUE)
  ) %>%
  filter(n > 1)

kable(tab)
```

now a plot, using the cleaned data

```{r}
#| warning: false
#| echo: false

ggplot(starwars, aes(height, mass)) + geom_point()
```
